items.title: Show HN: AI text rewriter with 90%+ detection pass rate
items.summary:
Hi HN, I built a tool that rewrites AI-generated text to pass detection systems like Turnitin and CNKI (知网). Unlike simple paraphrasing tools, it uses semantic understanding to maintain meaning while removing AI fingerprints. Technical approach:
- Analyzes sentence structure patterns typical of LLM outputs
- Rebuilds content using varied syntax and vocabulary distributions
- Preserves academic tone while reducing AI detection scores from 80%+ to <20% Tested on: CNKI (知网), VIP (维普), WanFang (万方), and Western detection systems Try it: https://www.yanbiai.com/tools/paper-pass?ly=hackernews Would love feedback from the community, especially on:
1. Ethical considerations (I know this is controversial)
2. Technical improvements to the rewriting algorithm
3. Detection evasion vs. genuine writing assistance Free tier available for testing. Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=45862583 Points: 2 # Comments: 0
